heading: Release following finding of violation
text:
If the OATH judge finds that the vehicle and/or tools were used in connection
  with unlicensed or unregistered activity, the department may release such vehicle and/or tools upon payment of all applicable fines
  and civil penalties and all reasonable costs of removal and storage, or may commence a forfeiture action within twenty business
  days after the date of the judgeâ€™s determination.
